org.terrier.utility.io

Class ResourceFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.utility.io.ResourceFileSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSystem

    public class ResourceFileSystem
extends Object
implements FileSystem
    Implements a read-only file system based on Java resources.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceFileSystem()
      Create a new HTTPFileSystem
